channel.title: Just got busted while mastrubating what to do :S?
channel.description:
I was just to searsh a nice movie from a porn site, already had my dick out of my pants :s
and 1 sec later i heard the door opening and my mom walked in i couldn't get the porn site away, and i couldn't get my dick in my pants :S
my mom just walked behind me and took something and walked back
How can i face here again with a straight face :S lol?

item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“t4, post:120, topic:435230”][quote author=Miss Silabsoft link=topic=537948.msg3935674#msg3935674 date=1331024939]
this thread is pretty lame trolling

However since we are all talking about rep it can still have meaning!

j98tY.png1208×507

who wants to challenge my 68 pages of rep
[/quote]
was your browser made in china? :s[/quote]
Rep doesn’t matter o.o, like in the pic below you can see derep cause I derepped someone over. then you see me getting derepped a few times by the same guy(hes derepped me like a gazlillion times just cba doing them all o.o. getting rep++ is for being liked personality wise/popularity mostly as people who constantly need help etc generally can’t rep(which is fair enough) and derep is if your disliked but the system blows for it. MITB is a smartypants for sure but I can think of a better system than that o.o, but of course there isn’t a need of a new system anyways.

deathschaos9:

Ehh, not big on hugging unless you have tits. >.>

This^
